projects.title: State's ownership of Holland Casino
projects.description: Representating and advocating the State's interests as shareholder in Holland Casino, the sole legal operator of casinos in The Netherlands. Frequent interaction with its Management Board (CEO, CFO) and Supervisory Board members, as well as with the responsible policy department (Ministry of Security and Justice). Prominent topics included solving Holland Casino's financial distress, setting in motion its financial restructuring and corporate reorganisation. Furthermore, preparation of possible privatisation scenarios for the State, including consideration of possible reforms of current gaming and gambling market regulatory framework.

projects.title: MIF-II US$ 500mln replenishment
projects.description: Active involvement in the US$ 500mln replenishment of the MIF, a multilateral donor fund created in 1992 by 26 countries to promote through the use of grants and investments broad-based economic growth through private sector development, particularly with microenterprises and small businesses. Its projects are intended to become self-sustaining and potentially to reach a scale capable of changing the lives of millions of people throughout Latin America and the Caribbean. I contributed to the entry of four new donor countries (United Kingdom, France, Switzerland and Sweden) and was able to assure a significant increase in the Netherlands’ contribution to EUR 15mln.

contributors.headline: Strategist | Manager | Finance, Economics & Risk | I love to sink my teeth in complex challenges | 1000+ LinkedIn connections

projects.title: 2007 meetings of the Committee of the Board of Governors & Non-Regional Meeting
projects.description: In the 2005-2007 IDB-HIPC debt relief negotiations I took the initiative for and organized the final round of negotiations of the Committee of the Board of Governors to be held in Amsterdam. Negotiations led to a successful outcome and agreement on a US$ 4.4bn debt cancellation for the poorest countries of Latin America & the Caribbean. Back-to-back with this meeting I organized in addition the annual two-day meeting of the non-regional Governors of the IADB.

profile_positions.description: Voor ABD Interim ondersteun ik ABD Topconsult bij de uitvoering van een opdracht bij de Benelux Unie in Brussel. De opdracht betreft het moderniseren van het financieel, HR en bedrijfsvoeringsmanagement.
profile_positions.title: Senior management consultant

company.name: Ministry of Infrastructure and Water Management

profile_positions.description:
Strategic advice on the National Growth Fund and the area-based development programme U Ned (on the Utrecht region in 2040-2050, see www.programma-uned.nl); plus interdepartmental coordination (with the Home Affairs Department, the Ministry of Economisc Affairs and the Ministry of Agriculture, Nature and Food Quality, and relationship management with the province, municipalities and other parties involved (Rijkswaterstaat, Prorail, NS). 

A selection of my results: 
• Completion of the MIRT Study "Utrecht Nabij". This study concerns the vision of the national government, province and municipalities on the spatial planning, mobility and urbanization of the Utrecht region in 2040 and beyond. The national and regional authorities were somewhat opposed in their views, and I was able to bring them closer together. National and regional interests are not always aligned; thanks to various interventions, I have succeeded in bringing all authorities and other parties to one shared vision. 
• On behalf of the Utrecht region, I submitted an investment proposal (EUR 2.1 billion) to the National Growth Fund to relieve the pressure on regional and national mobility networks. I provided guidance to the municipality and province in the dynamics of the process and decision-making of the Growth Fund. 
• On behalf of the Ministry of IenW, I contributed to the establishment of the National Growth Fund and the connection of the fund to the existing policy instruments under the MIRT and the Mobility Fund.
profile_positions.title: Senior Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
The Panta Rhei Foundation is the competent authority of 17 schools for primary education in the municipalities of Leidschendam-Voorburg, Voorschoten, Oegstgeest and The Hague. Its schools include Catholic charter schools, general particular schools and public schools. Over 500 professionals are dedicated to the daily primary education of nearly 5000 children ages 4 to 12. The foundation is financially sound and visibly invests in strengthening and furthering quality improvement in primary education. The Supervisory Board supervises the quality of the board, is the employer of the members of the Executive Board and must approve the matters referred to in the Articles of Association. In the Supervisory Board, my focus areas are the finance and business operations portfolios. As member of the Supervisory Board and member of the Audit Committee, I watch over the general soundness and continuity of the Panta Rhei Foundation and have particular interest for all things financial.

A selection of my results: 
- Expansion of the number of schools in the foundation from 14 to 17 through various merger processes. 
- Strategic reorientation of the foundation in a new four-year course plan.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: The DG Tax & Customs Administration advises the State Secretary on the governance of the Netherlands'​ Tax & Customs Administration (“Belastingdienst”). My responsibilities include improving organizational performance, execution of primary processes, the planning & control cycle, and budgetary exhaustion. I coordinated a team of 10-12 business controllers in liaising and intermediating between the directorate-general and organizational subsections on finance and control issues.
profile_positions.title: Team Coordinator, Budget & Finance Directorate, DG Belastingdienst, Ministry of Finance
Senior Strategisch Adviseur en Coördinator, Afdeling Staatsdeelnemingen, Directie Financieringen

profile_positions.description: On behalf of the State the Directorate is responsible for the State’s policies on Public-Private Partnerships and Asset Management. It advises Cabinet, policy departments and other public or government entities on corporate finance and governance, project finance and governance, strategy, investment proposals, risk analysis & management, business cases, tender procedures, DBFMO-contracts etc. My responsibities included advising the Ministry of Health on financing of health care real estate development, the Ministry of Defense on financing of fighter jet hardware maintenance as well as advising various other public entities on PPP- and/or AM-projects.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator, Public-Private Partnerships & Asset Management Division, Financing Directorate

profile_positions.description:
The Inter-American Development Bank (IADB) is the largest regional development bank and the main source of multilateral financing in Latin America & the Caribbean. I served as Executive Director of our constituency and representative for The Netherlands. 
During my tenure the Board of Executive Directors considered many financial and economic issues (e.g. capital position, loan charges, local currency lending, multi-year and results-based budgeting, Private Sector and Financial Sector Development) and loan / investment proposals. 
I served as liaison between The Netherlands’ state government and the IADB Group, as well as with commercial entities such as banks, corporates and representatives of the donor community and NGOs.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director and The Netherlands' representative

profile_positions.description: The Inter-American Investment Corporation (IIC) provides financing to small and medium private sector entities in Latin America and the Caribbean. The IIC is a member of the IADB Group, the largest source of multilateral financing to the region. At the IIC Board of Executive Directors I represented our constituency of Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy and The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for all Latin American and Inter-American Development Bank Group issues, as well as United Nations issues. This included (a.o.) interdepartmental coordination in preparation of the 2002 Johannesburg World Summit on Sustainable Development, the 2002 and 2003 IDB Annual Meetings and other multilateral meetings. I analyzed and advised on all relevant macroeconomic, financial and political developments in the Latin American region (a.o. the crisis in Argentina). In addition, I was also budget coordinator for the chapter of the Foreign Financial Relations Department in the National Budget, and as such participated in interdepartmental coordination and negotiations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Policy Advisor, International Financial Relations Directorate

profile_positions.description: I researched results-based budgeting options for the Foreign Affairs and Development Cooperation chapter of the national budget (“Rijksbegroting”) and successfully organized a financial experts seminar for the Ministry’s Directors; subsequently I edited the booklet-publication of results.
profile_positions.title: Internship, Financial & Economic Affairs Directorate

profile_positions.description: I researched The Netherlands national budget’s sensitivity to changes in the international economic cycle and the potential counter effects of automatic stabilizers vis-à-vis discretionary budgetary policies to cushion the impact of adverse external developments. The outcomes have been published in my thesis "Budgettaire of automatische stabilisatie: beleidsopties voor Nederland in de Economische en Monetaire Unie" (Discretionary or automatic stabilisation: policy optios for The Netherlands in the Economic and Monetary Union). The thesis was graded 9 on a 10-point scale, comparable to an "A" (US-scale).
profile_positions.title: Internship, General Financial & Economic Affairs Directorate

volunteer_experiences.description: De Stichting Natuurspeeltuin Voorschoten beoogt de realisatie van een natuurspeeltuin in de gemeente Voorschoten. Ik neem deel aan de werkgroep financiën, die beoogt de middelen te verwerven waarmee de aanleg gerealiseerd kan worden.
Trainer van jongste jeugd (Kabouters, Benjamini’s) en coach bij de F’jes
De opdracht van de kandidaatsstellingscommissie is selectiegesprekken te voeren met aangemelde kandidaten voor de gemeenteraadsverkiezingen.
